last_episode_to_air.name: Vote for Kate
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kate ignores her friends' advice and stands against Councillor Bone as the local police and crime commissioner. Medium is set to leave for a job abroad, while Koji's appeal is going badly and it looks as if Kate may be left alone.

name: Kate & Koji
overview: Kate runs an old-fashioned café in a seaside town, and develops a strong, if sometimes volatile, friendship with asylum-seeking African doctor Koji. Although from different worlds, Kate and Koji are similar in ways they do not see for themselves.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Kate, a prickly cafe owner, becomes increasingly frustrated with refugee Koji but when she discovers his true circumstances, she hatches a mutually beneficial plan.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: With Kate and Koji's undercover clinic in full swing, the last thing they need is a visit from Dr Radwan. Medium keeps Koji calm.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Despite Kate being sued after an accident in the cafe, she refuses to back down and Koji is reluctant to get involved.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When word reaches them that a storm is headed for town, Kate refuses to step in line, much to the grief of Councillor Bone. Koji discovers he’s been given a jacket with an unfortunate history and Medium may have lost Kate a lot of money on the horses.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When Kate’s flashy ex-husband Dennis arrives in town with his much younger wife, Kate feigns an attachment to Koji. Councillor Bone is sure their relationship is a front, but that doesn’t stop a good old-fashioned show down at the pub.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Not for the first time, Kate is being sued, but this time by Councillor Bone. Koji discovers he is under investigation for working illegally.

episodes.name: Lockdown Legends
episodes.overview: A return to the cafe of Kate, a woman with strong views that she loves to share with Koji and her nephew, Medium. Kate is to be awarded a star prize.

episodes.name: Koji In Charge
episodes.overview: Kate lets asylum-seeker Koji run the cafe, which he does all too well. Meanwhile, Medium wants feedback on the novel he's written.

episodes.name: Memories
episodes.overview: Koji has an unpleasant experience which Kate tries to put right, with the aid of a World War Two gun.

episodes.name: Koji's Date
episodes.overview: Despite his disastrous record, Koji decides to take a chance on romance and Kate decides she's going to help him. What could possibly go wrong?

episodes.name: Saint Lavinia
episodes.overview: When her lifelong enemy suddenly decides to make amends, Kate thinks she smells a rat. Meanwhile, Koji develops a curious symptom.

episodes.name: Vote for Kate
episodes.overview: Kate ignores her friends' advice and stands against Councillor Bone as the local police and crime commissioner. Medium is set to leave for a job abroad, while Koji's appeal is going badly and it looks as if Kate may be left alone.
